ObjectDescription
A Sweatshirt featuring a new color. This item cannot be obtained as a Home Reward in Namco Museum. Wear this to stand out from the crowd! [#Legal]
Un Sweat-shirt présentant une nouvelle couleur. Cet article ne peut être obtenu comme récompense Home dans Namco Museum. Portez-le pour vous démarquer des autres ! [#Legal]
Ein Sweatshirt mit brandneuer Farbe. Dieser Artikel kann nicht als Home-Gewinn im Namco Museum erworben werden. Tragen Sie ihn, um sich von anderen abzuheben! [#Legal]
Una felpa di un colore nuovo. Questa maglia non può essere vinta in Namco Museum. Indossala e distinguiti dalla folla! [#Legal]
Sudadera con un color nuevo. Este artículo no se puede obtener como premio Home en Namco Museum. ¡Póntelo para llamar la atención! [#Legal]
ナムコミュージアムリワードアイテムのニューカラージャージです。これを着用して他の人と差をつけよう！[#Legal]
남코뮤지엄의 리워드 아이템인 뉴 컬러 저지 셔츠입니다. 남들하고는 달라야죠! [#Legal]
A Sweatshirt featuring a new color. This item cannot be obtained as a Home Reward in Namco Museum. Wear this to stand out from the crowd! [#Legal]
Namco Museum獎品的新色上衣，只可在這裡拿到。穿起它讓自己與別不同吧！[#Legal]
Namco Museum獎品的新色上衣，只能在這裡得到。穿起它讓自己與眾不同吧！[#Legal]

This two-tone jacket will keep you warm and stylish, but it's the attention to detail that sets this piece apart. The subtle yet charming Pac-Man zipper tab will show anyone that you're a true fan of the classics![#Legal]
